adminRegisterBox.title: Admin Registration
adminRegisterBox.description: Please enter your Admin ID, Email, and Password to register.
adminRegisterBox.adminIdHelpMessage: Enter the Admin ID you requested from the rout web manager.
adminRegisterBox.ownerIdDetected: The entered Admin ID is an Owner ID.
adminRegisterBox.invalidAdminId: Invalid Admin ID. Please check again.

registerBox.fillDetails: Please fill in the details below to proceed.
registerBox.welcomeMessage: Hello! Welcome. I will guide you through the registration process.
registerBox.askUsername: Okay, let's start. What is your username?
registerBox.invalidEmail: Invalid email format. Please enter a valid email address.
registerBox.askEmail: Hello {username}! What is your email address?
registerBox.askPassword: Thank you. Now, create your password.
registerBox.passwordMismatch: Password and confirm password do not match. Please re-enter your password confirmation.
registerBox.processingRegistration: Great! Your registration is being processed...
registerBox.reviewDetails: Great! Please review your details before confirming.
registerBox.usernameExists: This username is already taken. Please try another.
registerBox.emailExists: This email is already registered. Please use another email.

registrationSummary.title: Confirm Your Data
registrationSummary.description: Please make sure your details are correct before proceeding.

adminCreateCredentialsBox.title: Create Admin Credentials
adminCreateCredentialsBox.description: Please create a username and password for the new admin account.
adminCreateCredentialsBox.passwordMismatch: Password and confirm password do not match.
adminCreateCredentialsBox.passwordInvalid: Password does not meet validation criteria.
adminCreateCredentialsBox.auth/email-already-in-use: This email is already registered. Use another email.

validation.adminIdFormat: Admin ID must start with 'f3' followed by characters (letters/numbers) and end with 'r'.
